Best storylines from the '25 MLB Draft Best on-field swag from the All-Star Futures Game Prospect Team of the Week: June 30-July 6 Top 10 Prospects All-Star Futures Game rosters The homers keep coming for KC's Carter Jensen Owen Caissie becoming a mash machine Prospect Team of the Week: June 23-29 McGonigle another Tiger on rise 2025's 1st MLB home runs Chase Burns' electric debut The power has caught up for Caglianone Misiorowski throwing heat in MLB debut 2025's best Triple-A Statcast pitches Top MLB debuts from 2025 Samuel Basallo swinging for a callup Jett the Met a hitting machine Mayer making mark in Boston Roman Anthony has ARRIVED Thomas White racking up the punchouts Prospect Team of the Week: June 16-22 Prospect Team of the Week: June 9-15 Prospect Team of the Week: June 2-8 Kyle Teel joins the White Sox carousel-arrow-right-5 Draft Day 2: Overview, schedule, best available Day 1 of the 2025 Draft lasted a little longer than usual, going from Oklahoma prep shortstop Eli Willits at No. 1 to the Nationals to Nate Snead at No. 105 to the Angels as a compensation selection. Day 2 is going to be even busier. Rounds 4-20 arrive Monday Draft Day 1: Pick-by-pick rundown, analysis ATLANTA -- Day 1 of the 2025 Draft is in the books, as clubs made the first 105 selections on Sunday night, covering Rounds 1, 2 and 3, Competitive Balance Rounds A and B, plus two compensation picks. It was an unforgettable night for every player selected, but a few Stunners at the top, shortstops galore and more takeaways from Draft Day 1 ATLANTA -- The first three rounds of the 2025 MLB Draft were held Sunday night at the Coca Cola Roxy next to Truist Park, and attendees and viewers can be forgiven if many of the names of an especially high-school-heavy Draft prospect pool were foreign to them. But keep in Nationals make 17-year-old Eli Willits No. 1 overall pick ATLANTA – The Nationals had the No. 1 overall pick in the 2025 MLB Draft for the first time in 15 years, and with the coveted selection, they chose the youngest prospect in the class. The Nats picked shortstop Eli Willits from Fort Cobb-Broxton High School (Okla.). At 17 years Nationals Follow E. Willits Follow Rockies take Ethan Holliday, son of franchise great, at No. 4 overall DENVER – Ethan Holliday was almost 8 months old when his father, Matt Holliday, and his big brother, Jackson – then 4 years old but aware – were on the infield at Coors Field celebrating the Rockies’ qualification for the 2007 World Series. The family ties between the Hollidays and E. But they came away with an even bigger coup than Mariners Follow K. Anderson Follow Underdog mentality, overpowering fastball fueled the rise of 2025's No. 5 Draft pick This story originally ran previously, before Liam Doyle was drafted with the No. 5 pick by the Cardinals. L. Doyle Follow Emerson, Peterson advance to finals in 2025 High School Home Run Derby ATLANTA – Saturday was a good day to be a Longhorn. Grady Emerson and Beau Peterson – both University of Texas commits in the 2026 class – hit 26 home runs apiece to advance as the finalists in the 2025 High School Home Run Derby at Atlanta’s Truist Park, home Top 100 prospects: Injuries & roster moves Here is the latest on injuries and roster moves involving MLB Pipeline's Top 100 prospects: R. Rodriguez Follow LIVE: Draft Day 2 is underway for Giants Day 1 of the 2025 Draft featured the Giants' picks from Rounds 1-3, including Gavin Kilen at No. 13 overall. Day 2 begins Monday at 8:30 a.m. PT through the conclusion of the Draft, spanning Rounds 4-20. Watch live on MLB.com and MLB.TV, and check back for updates throughout the Giants Follow LIVE: Draft Day 2 is underway for Dodgers Day 1 of the 2025 Draft featured the Dodgers' picks from Rounds 1-3, including Zach Root at No. 40 overall.
